name: Flip in Hell
description:
Flip your way through Hell in an endless journey of challenges to overcome!

Game Features:

• Tap to flip your little devil. Double tapping will produce double flips.
• Flip between platforms. Each time you successfully land on a platform you will score a point.
• Flipping though an endless Hell will always result in eventual death. How far can you flip?

Other Features Include:

• Beat your high scores and compete with others in the Game Center Leaderboard.
• Share your high scores with others. Post your scores directly to Facebook, Twitter and using iMessage.
• Want an ad free experience? No problem - upgrade and permanently remove all advertisements.
